name: Schrodinger's Dice
description:
Schrodinger's Dice  was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 Hours.

Following The Theme Of The Roll Of The Dice This Game Is Heavily Based On Chance.

The Dice System Is A Qubit that Has Both Certain And Superpositional States,

The Game Is Based On Quatum Mechanics.

This projects Source Code Is Liscensed Under GNU GPL 3.0 at https://github.com/lostybtw/Schrodingers-Dice
